get.summary: Provides content for a prisoner to satisfy the needs of a subject access request on their behalf
get.description: Requires role SAR_DATA_ACCESS or additional role as specified by hmpps.sar.additionalAccessRole configuration.

parameters.name: prn
parameters.description: NOMIS Prison Reference Number

parameters.name: crn
parameters.description: nDelius Case Reference Number

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting minimum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting maximum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

get.summary: Get transfer reported adjudications for caseload

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: list of status filter for reports

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: TransferType, IN OUT or ALL

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N). Default 0, e.g. the first page

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default 20

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort as combined comma separated property and uppercase direction. Multiple sort params allowed to sort by multiple properties. Default to dateTimeOfDiscovery DESC

get.summary: Get adjudications for all offender bookings for a prisoner

parameters.description: prisoner number

parameters.description: optional inclusive start date for results

parameters.description: optional inclusive end date for results

parameters.description: list of status filter for reports, if null will return all

parameters.name: ada
parameters.description: show reports with ADA

parameters.name: pada
parameters.description: show reports with PADA

parameters.name: suspended
parameters.description: show reports with suspended

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Results page you want to retrieve (0..N). Default 0, e.g. the first page

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default 20

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort as combined comma separated property and uppercase direction. Multiple sort params allowed to sort by multiple properties. Default to date_time_of_discovery DESC

parameters.name: Active-Caseload
parameters.description: Current Caseload for request, to be used when making calls to a specific report

reporter.description: optional reporter as per token, used when editing

WitnessesRequest.description: Request to update the list of witnesses for a draft adjudication

CombinedOutcomeDto.description: Combined Outcome - currently to support referral but maybe expanded once awards are added

dateTimeOfIssue.description: Previous date time of form issued

locationId.description: The id of the location of the hearing

locationName.description: The name of the location of the hearing

locationUuid.description: The location uuid of the location the hearing

dateTimeOfHearing.description: Date and time the hearing will take place

id.description: The id of the hearing outcome

locationId.description: The id of the location the incident took place

locationName.description: The name of the location the incident took place

locationUuid.description: The uuid of the location the incident took place

dateTimeOfIncident.description: Date and time the incident occurred

dateTimeOfDiscovery.description: Date time of discovery if date different to incident date

handoverDeadline.description: When this report must be handed to the prisoner

roleCode.description: The incident role code, If not set then it is assumed they committed the offence on their own

offenceRule.description: The offence rules related to the given incident role, Will not be set of there is no role code

associatedPrisonersNumber.description: The prison number of the other prisoner involved in the incident, This only applies to role codes 25b and 25c

associatedPrisonersName.description: The name of the other prisoner involved in the incident, This only applies when the prisoner is from outside the establishment

completed.description: Indicates when the statement is complete

offenceRule.description: The offence rules they have broken

victimPrisonersNumber.description: The prison number of the victim involved in the incident, if relevant

victimStaffUsername.description: The username of the member of staff who is a victim of the incident, if relevant

victimOtherPersonsName.description: The name of the victim (who is not a member of staff or a prisoner) involved in the incident, if relevant

protectedCharacteristics.description: list of protected characteristics for offence, empty if non involved in offence
